channel.title: My main was banned also "o well"
channel.description:
Ive never really posted in this forums just kinda read topics and such, today my main (level 77) (989 total) was banned! I also mis-entered my appeal by pressing enter. :mad: But i want to inform you guys that ive been auto'ing on my main for about 5 days now, and its pretty impressive that they caught me that fast. I was using Aryan /flax() script only too. Anyways, this is just a small warning, i think jagex is up to somthing cause someone on the forum got banned and 2 RL friends i know got banned today also. I think im going to quit runescape for a while, i think i might do the same thing as the other guy on here that got banned (Making lot of bots in free2play) Good luck to you all on scripting/macroing, this website helped me alot, especially the script tut's and such, also a shout out to Mopar, NICE server Client and Aryan updater You PWN Jagex! You guys might find me on Uber server. *Auto'er 4 Life* --Polaris
Still, i was making LOTS of cash, for the 5 days that i did auto i made 4.5m (Sold roughly 45000 flax)(About 9k flax a day)

item.title: My main was banned also "o well"
item.dc:creator: @ruler ruler
item.description:
@ruler wrote:

[quote=“moparisthebest, post:11, topic:2011”][quote author=Wenakko link=topic=2103.msg19668#msg19668 date=1146139257]

standard aryan is not for mains

standard scar mouse functions are dectable.

Standard? Then what is for mains? not a standard aryan? a modified aryan?
[/quote]

well ruler would tell you that his “slavebot” (its just a modified aryan) would be less detectable, but really its just as detectable, IF your going to auto on your main right now the only undetectable choice is SCAR[/quote][br][size=1]Posted at: April 27, 2006, 09:48:50 am[/size][hr]standard mouse functions are dectable[br][size=1]Posted at: April 27, 2006, 09:49:08 am[/size][hr]great now i am stuck[br][size=1]Posted at: April 27, 2006, 09:49:37 am[/size][hr]let me out mopar, stop it

Read full topic

@Angelohavoc wrote:

lol yeah, i made an account members just to see how much flax i could get, i got 79k flax, sold it, then transferred the money to a mule, the next day the account got banned and the mule i put it on got banned as well XD

Read full topic

item.source: My main was banned also "o well"

item.title: My main was banned also "o well"
item.dc:creator: @Loz Loz
item.description:
@Loz wrote:

Neverrrrr auto your main…

Also, if you didn’t know, most of us have had many lvl 3’s banned. Getting banned for Aryan is not IF, but WHEN you get banned. Always look at it that way. If you value an account, never auto it or interact with your bots in any way.

Read full topic
item.source: My main was banned also "o well"

item.title: My main was banned also "o well"
item.dc:creator: @Polaris Polaris
item.description:
@Polaris wrote:

[quote=“BAsh, post:9, topic:2011”]Aryan is more detectable than scar, this is because: instead of click on your inventory, it changes a variable. This is the same for things like banking.

Scar on the other, controls the windows mouse and physically moves it across the screen. Simulating mouse clicks in the java window or telling micro$oft windows where the mouse is, is irrelevent - the java program can’t tell. What makes a difference is scar simulates ALL mouse clicks, but Aryan only simulates SOME of them.[/quote]
Thanks, i understand scar/aryan lots more! So Jagex basically can see those varialbe changes in Aryan. But scar is all about color clicking therefore all they see is mouse clicks. Right?

[quote=“hs_millions, post:10, topic:2011”]dont use that noob flaxer lol
no selling on this forum[/quote]
Lol, the only problem i had with /flax() was that it didnt bank anyother items except flax, i also tryed /imp_flax() but that one had some location problems (Walking in circles in flax field)

Freddy1990:

Polaris, 1 word of advice, do NOT macro on your main. lol

I wouldnt have macro’d on my main but he was the only one that was a member, and i didnt really see a way to get flax without being a member, or any kind of quick cash without being a member. I didnt really feel like spending another 5$ to get that acc banned either, but from now on i guess people should ONLY use scar on mains . I wish i would have known that!

Read full topic

item.title: My main was banned also "o well"
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“Wenakko, post:6, topic:2011”][quote author=ruler link=topic=2103.msg19630#msg19630 date=1146120396]
standard aryan is not for mains
[/quote]

Standard? Then what is for mains? not a standard aryan? a modified aryan?[/quote]

well ruler would tell you that his “slavebot” (its just a modified aryan) would be less detectable, but really its just as detectable, IF your going to auto on your main right now the only undetectable choice is SCAR

Read full topic

item.source: My main was banned also "o well"

item.title: My main was banned also "o well"
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Aryan is more detectable than scar, this is because: instead of click on your inventory, it changes a variable. This is the same for things like banking.

Scar on the other, controls the windows mouse and physically moves it across the screen. Simulating mouse clicks in the java window or telling micro$oft windows where the mouse is, is irrelevent - the java program can’t tell. What makes a difference is scar simulates ALL mouse clicks, but Aryan only simulates SOME of them.

Read full topic
item.source: My main was banned also "o well"

item.title: My main was banned also "o well"
item.dc:creator: @Polaris Polaris
item.description:
@Polaris wrote:

I tryed scar, but never got it to work successfuly. I also know that its a big risk to auto on a main but what i’d like to know is how aryan is more detectable than scar, or is it that aryan uses something else (Ghost click?) Rather than SCARs full mouse control?

EDIT: They banned a friend on my buddylist, just found out. I traded some cash to him a while back. I hate you jagex!

Read full topic

Aryan is pretty easy to detect. only auto on accounts thay you won’t miss if they get banned. SCAR is much safer, but slower. (it think)
